footer.tagline: Taking care of your mental health with professionalism, empathy and welcoming
footer.description: Dedicated to providing comprehensive mental health care with a team of experienced professionals committed to your emotional well-being and personal growth.
footer.legalInfo: CRP: 06/12345 | CNPJ: 12.345.678/0001-90 | Technical Manager: Dr. Ana Carolina Silva

1.title: Individual Psychotherapy
1.description: Individualized psychological care for anxiety, depression, self-esteem and personal development.

2.title: Couples Therapy
2.description: Therapeutic support for couples seeking to improve communication and strengthen relationships.

3.title: Psychiatry
3.description: Evaluation, diagnosis and medical treatment of mental disorders by specialized doctors.

4.title: Child Therapy
4.description: Specialized care for children and adolescents with emotional and behavioral difficulties.

5.title: Group Therapy
5.description: Therapeutic group sessions to share experiences and develop social skills.

6.title: Career Guidance
6.description: Psychological support for career choice and professional transitions with self-awareness.

7.title: Psychological Assessment
7.description: Comprehensive evaluation with psychological tests for diagnosis and proper therapeutic guidance.

8.title: Family Therapy
8.description: Systemic support for families seeking to improve dynamics and resolve conflicts.

9.title: Neuropsychology
9.description: Assessment and rehabilitation of cognitive functions such as memory, attention and language.

10.title: Online Psychotherapy
10.description: Psychological care at a distance with the same quality and confidentiality as in-person service.

1.name: Dr. Ana Carolina Ribeiro
1.bio: Specialist in Cognitive Behavioral Therapy with 12 years of experience in treating adults and adolescents.

2.name: Dr. Rafael Mendes
2.bio: Psychiatrist focused on anxiety and depression disorders, evidence-based and humanized practice.

3.name: Dr. Juliana Costa
3.bio: Psychologist specialized in child and family care, trained in play therapy and child development.

4.name: Dr. Marcos Almeida
4.bio: Specialist in couples and family therapy with systemic approach and over 10 years of clinical experience.

5.name: Dr. Fernanda Lima
5.bio: Neuropsychologist specialized in cognitive assessment and rehabilitation of higher brain functions.

6.name: Dr. Carlos Eduardo Santos
6.bio: Specialist in career guidance and development, certified professional coach.

7.name: Dr. Beatriz Rodrigues
7.bio: Psychologist focused on adolescents, specialist in mood and anxiety disorders in adolescence.

8.name: Dr. Paulo Henrique Dias
8.bio: Systemic family therapist with specialization in family constellation and interpersonal dynamics.

1.title: Anxiety: How to Identify and Seek Help
1.excerpt: Understand the signs of anxiety and know when to seek a mental health professional.
1.author: Dr. Ana Carolina Ribeiro

2.title: Depression: Beyond Sadness
2.excerpt: Understand the difference between normal sadness and clinical depression, and available treatments.
2.author: Dr. Rafael Mendes

3.title: Child Development and Emotions
3.excerpt: How children develop emotions and the importance of creating a safe environment for emotional growth.
3.author: Dr. Juliana Costa

4.title: Healthy Relationships: Communication is Everything
4.excerpt: Practical tips to improve relationship communication and strengthen emotional bonds.
4.author: Dr. Marcos Almeida

5.title: Memory and Cognition: Understanding Your Brain
5.excerpt: Explore how memory works and techniques to keep cognition active and healthy.
5.author: Dr. Fernanda Lima

6.title: Burnout: Recognize the Signs and Know How to Prevent It
6.excerpt: Professional exhaustion affects millions of people. Learn to identify symptoms and prevention strategies.
6.author: Dr. Ana Carolina Ribeiro
